full_text.full_text:
Nearest Neighbor Classifiers
▪ Eager learners
– Learn a model as soon as the training data available
– (ex) decision tree classifiers
▪ Lazy learners
– Delay the process of modeling the training data until it is needed to 
classify the test instances
– (ex) nearest neighbor classifiers
▪ Basic idea of nearest neighbor classifiers
– Given a test instance, find all the training instances similar to it
• These instances are called nearest neighbors
– Determine the class label of the instance based on its nearest neighbors
9

text.text:
– Learn a model as soon as the training data available
– (ex) decision tree classifiers

– Delay the process of modeling the training data until it is needed to 
classify the test instances
– (ex) nearest neighbor classifiers
▪ Basic idea of nearest neighbor classifiers
– Given a test instance, find all the training instances similar to it
• These instances are called nearest neighbors
– Determine the class label of the instance based on its nearest neighbors
